CareServiceVisit.name: CareServiceVisit
CareServiceVisit.description: Associates a service request or a referral request (ClinicalServiceRequest) with a visit (ServiceAppointment) that’s part of that service or referral.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account associated with the patient who received the care service.

AutoVerifiedVisitEndDtTm.description: The end date and time of the care service visit that's automatically updated from the care giver's mobile device.

AutoVrfyVisitEndLoc.description: The end location of the care service visit that's automatically updated from the care giver's mobile device.

AutoVrfyVisitStartDtTm.description: The start date and time of the care service visit that's automatically updated from the care giver's mobile device.

AutoVrfyVstStartLoc.description: The start location of the care service visit that's automatically updated from the care giver's mobile device.

CarePlanContextId.description: The ID of the care plan, care plan detail, goal assignment, or action plan associated with the care service visit.

CareServiceVisitPlanId.description: The ID of the care service visit plan associated with the care service visit.

ClinicalServiceRequestId.description: The service request that the visit is related to.

EndedById.description: The ID of the care giver who ends the care service visit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

ManVerifiedVisitEndDtTm.description: The end date and time of the care service visit that's verified and updated by a care professional from the Home Health agency.

ManVerifiedVisitStartDtTm.description: The start date and time of the care service visit that's verified and updated by a care professional from the Home Health agency.

ManVrfyVisitEndLoc.description: The end location of the care service visit that's verified and updated by a care professional from the Home Health agency.

ManVrfyVisitStartLoc.description: The start location of the care service visit that's verified and updated by a care professional from the Home Health agency.

RelatedVisitId.description: Specifies the ID of a related care service visit that’s associated with a care service visit.

RelatedVisitType.description: Specifies the type of related visit that's associated with the care service visit.

ServiceRequestId.description: A derived field that’s used for internal purposes.

SourceReferenceRecordId.description: The quote or party appointment request that's the source of the care service visit.

StartedById.description: The ID of the care giver who starts the care service visit.

VisitId.description: The visit that’s related to the service request.

VisitType.description: The type of the care service visit.
